item.title: Hope - Journal
item.description: This is accompanied with Hope This is to maintain a daily journal of the efforts. This is to be seen from bottom to top. To explain the jargons: cw: current weight gw: goal weight Ok, lets start. February 28, 2021 cw: 75.35 pulls: 0 A long walk. I walked 8.24 kms yesterday in about 1:28:04. The best pace was at 8:28 min/km, whereas the average floated at around 10:41 min/km.
